game.name: Dual Force
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dual Force is a fast-paced 2D fantasy action game where two heroes fight to save a world falling into darkness. Join them, grow stronger, and help push back the evil threatening all life. Every new player adds to the force that can restore light and save the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dual Force is a fast-paced 2D fantasy action game where two heroes fight to save a world falling into darkness. Join them, grow stronger, and help push back the evil threatening all life. Every new player adds to the force that can restore light and save the world.
